classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU General Public License (GPL)
License :: OSI Approved :: GNU Library or Lesser General Public License (LGPL)
Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Python Modules
info.description:
PyRTF is a pure python module for the efficient generation of rich text format
documents. Supports styles, tables, cell merging, jpg and png images and tries
to maintain compatibility with as many RTF readers as possible.
info.name: PyRTF
info.summary: PyRTF - Rich Text Format Document Generation
info.html_description: PyRTF is a pure python module for the efficient generation of rich text format documents. Supports styles, tables, cell merging, jpg and png images and tries to maintain compatibility with as many RTF readers as possible.
